answerText: Gunter Grass [10] Grass is most famous for his Danzig trilogy, which includes this final novel about Eduard Amsel and Waltern Matern.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Carnegie Mellon University and University of Central Florida | 3 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The 2004 revelation that this author was a member of the Waffen-SS led to some controversy about whether he should have been awarded his Nobel Prize. For 10 points each:   [10] ] Identify this German author and 1999 winner of the Nobel Prize in Literature, author of The Flounder and My Century.
